thread.title: Vice President eCommerce - Brand US - Sports Equipment
thread.title_full: Vice President eCommerce - Brand US - Sports Equipment

title: Vice President eCommerce - Brand US - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: Manage and deliver against full financial P&L for the US eCommerce business. Identify key growth strategies or eCommerce in the US and create business plans that result in the establishment of a long term interactive relationship between us and the consumer.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
